channel.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Item_Prices on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Product_Package_Item_Prices on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Item_Prices
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Item_Prices Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Package_Item_Prices contains price to package cross references Relates a category, price and item to a bundle. Match bundle ids to see all items and prices in a particular bundle. Local id The unique identifier for SoftLayer_Product_Package_Item_Price. This is only needed as a reference. The important data is the itemPriceId property. Type: integer itemPriceId The SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price id. This value is to be used when placing orders.
